feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: He was staring at her with undisguised surprise, and disapproval also, she thought.

causedByEvent.name: Seeing Meg in a fine lady outfit

hasObject.name: Meg in a fine lady outfit

feels.name: Disapproval
feels.quote: He was staring at her with undisguised surprise, and disapproval also, she thought.

causedByEvent.name: Seeing Meg in a fine lady outfit

hasObject.name: Meg in a fine lady outfit

feels.name: Embarrassment
feels.quote: He glanced at her frizzled head, bare shoulders, and fantastically trimmed dress, with an expression that abashed her more than his answer.

causedByEvent.name: Meg asking for his opinion on her appearance

feels.name: Penitence
feels.quote: Please forgive my rudeness, and come and dance with me.

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: I do think you are--just splendid.

feels.name: Embarrassment
feels.quote: She was flirting her fan and laughing at the feeble jokes of a young gentleman who tried to be witty, when she suddenly stopped laughing and looked confused.

feels.name: Discomfort
feels.quote: The tight dress gave her an uncomfortably brilliant color.

feels.name: Regret
feels.quote: I wish I'd been sensible, and worn my own things; then I should not have disgusted other people, or felt so uncomfortable and ashamed myself.

feels.name: Embarrassment
feels.quote: I wish I'd been sensible, and worn my own things; then I should not have disgusted other people, or felt so uncomfortable and ashamed myself.

causedByEvent.name: Realizing the impact of her appearance
